[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [FlyoutMetricsManager](./blockly.flyoutmetricsmanager_class.md)

## FlyoutMetricsManager class

Calculates metrics for a flyout's workspace. The metrics are mainly used to size scrollbars for the flyout.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FlyoutMetricsManager extends MetricsManager 
```
**Extends:** [MetricsManager](./blockly.metricsmanager_class.md)

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [flyout\_](./blockly.flyoutmetricsmanager_class.flyout__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | [IFlyout](./blockly.iflyout_interface.md) | The flyout that owns the workspace to calculate metrics for. |
